description: During the volume uuid migration ec2 id formats for volumes and snapshots was dropped and is now using the default instance format (i-xxxxx).  These need to be changed back to vol-xxx and snap-xxxx.
title: ec2 volume and snapshot id's is incorrect

comments.content: During the volume uuid migration ec2 id formats for volumes and snapshots was dropped and is now using the default instance format (i-xxxxx).  These need to be changed back to vol-xxx and snap-xxxx.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~john-griffith

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/8613
